title: The Alienware x14 ultra-thin gaming laptop is now available to buy
content:
The Alienware x14 is now available to buy on Dell’s website, the company announced today. Touted as the world’s thinnest 14-inch gaming laptop, the Alienware x14 promises a great gaming experience while still being reasonably portable. It’s just 14.5mm thin, which is incredibly impressive considering the specs packed into the laptop. It also starts at

The post The Alienware x14 ultra-thin gaming laptop is now available to buy appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Alienware has announced that the x14, the world's thinnest 14-inch gaming laptop, is now available to order starting at $1,649.
